ISSUE.TITLE: Allow sending contacts
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Feature Request <!-- Fill in the relevant information below to help triage your issue. --> It would be great to be able to send signal contact objects. I believe signal-cli allows it with [`client.send_contact`](https://github.com/AsamK/signal-cli/blob/master/client/src/main.rs#L167C57-L167C57), but I don't know rust, so I'm not sure.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: handle multicharacter emojis in textstyleparser see #413
